name: Galaxy Cow
description:
In space, no one can hear you moo.

Have you ever hurled a lasso around a cow and been dragged through an asteroid field while collecting milk and clinging to a rope for dear life? 

OF COURSE NOT- BUT NOW YOU CAN!

How to play

Use W & S or Up & Down to maneuver the Cow and avoid plowing the Cowboy face first into an asteroid.

Collect milk in your bucket and press Spacebar with a full bottle to unleash a cosmic moo that rips asunder the very fabric of space to destroy asteroids.
